user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_age = #{userAge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_address = #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deci = #{deci,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
